Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the impact of the restrictions on barbecue restaurants by stating that it effectively imposes a ban.
Lack enough support: The claim may lack sufficient evidence or support to prove that Austin is imposing a ban on barbecue restaurants.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the restrictions on smoke from barbecue restaurants will have a detrimental effect on all but the largest establishments, without providing enough evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the restrictions on smoke from barbecue restaurants, such as addressing concerns from nearby homeowners about the impact of smoke on their properties.
